product_name: The North Face GTD T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring FlashDry(TM) fibers in the fabric that speed up drying time, The North Face GTD T-shirt for women makes reaching your fitness goals just a bit more comfortable. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Polyester wicks away sweat; natural particles in fabric resist odors. Mesh panels at sides and arms promote cooling airflow where needed. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD for women T-shirt help keep you visible. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring FlashDry(TM) fibers in the fabric that speed up drying time, The North Face GTD T-shirt for women makes reaching your fitness goals just a bit more comfortable.
